Pas spécialment répétitif (même si on s'y attendrait) Ce jeu est une pure merveille de coop, un bon défouloir et peut aussi être super difficile. La possibilité d'augmenter ses 7 perks rend ce jeu addictif, et plusieurs heures (~400-500) sont neccessaire pour augmenter ses stats à fond, et encore. La floppé de niveau inclus et ceux gratuitement téléchargeable en font un jeu très communautaire et ou l'ennui n'a pas sa place.
Beaucoup de fun si vous jouez avec des potes, de la rivalité aussi (monter ses perks en premier, tuer le plus de mobs, buter le boss...) rajoute aussi si vous aimez vous en vanter devant vos amis avant des les soigner de leur filer du fric et des armes (car oui, c'est avant tout un jeu de coop)
Brezf, une merveille, je l'avais déjà avant steam avec beaucoup de perks level 5-6, ça ne m'a pas empêché de l'acheter et de recommencer à 0 sans pleurer.
trop bien , pas prise de tête accessible à tous, nouveaux défis, maps, perso et maps renouvellés, des éditeurs qui jouent le jeu de faire des events..... bref un de mes jeux même si vieu préférés
KF still has plenty to offer even when KF2 is around the corner, find modded servers and have a blast.
great game to play with firends.
juste excellent pour jouer avec des amis ! je me donne pas la peine de dire pourquoi je lui met une note positive il suffit de lire les autres commentaires je ne ferai que répéter
This game is actually a comedy game

if i could sum up killing floor in 6 words they would be...a good game that needs polish.

i had put off buying killing floor for a while due to more interesting games showing up,but with the steam sales i went out on a limb and bought it and...wasn't sure what to expect.when i got in i enjoyed it but something felt off...

the game is well executed(cutting through zed with a katana fells awesome on MANY levels.)but the game seems to be quite...unpolished in a way.it almost feels b-movieish in a way.

the voice acting is abit rough with only a few voice lines for everything,the graphics(while the film filter is a nice touch)is a little rough around the edges,and some of the shop item graphics make it look like they were ripped from google images.

the rest though is pretty solid(if,for me at least,it got a little repetative quite quick)the weapons are useful in their own way,although sometimes weapon don't cater to their weaknesses.(shotguns have suprisingly long range,abit TOO long for a shotgun)

the design of the zeds are actully pretty cool,especially the festive zeds fitting the theme of the time of year of the area you're in.

after i've gone out on a hacked off limb,i give killing floor a 7/10.

it feels like a mod with the lack of polish BUT it feels like a good mod.

i got killing floor on the steam sales and it was a good game for the price i paid.but at £15 it asking a bit much.i will be getting killing floor 2 as it seems like it might have answered my problems with the original.

i'll be giving my thoughts about killing floor 2 when i get around to playing it.but for now.

if you want a decent game zombie coop survival game despite alittle lack of polish i recomend killing floor.

KF被中国玩家们诙谐地直译为“杀地板”，这种有趣的称呼在中国玩家中广泛流传，以至于不少对其了解不深的人都忘记了它本来的名字，印象中只种下了刺激而有趣的‘杀地板’。KF是多人联机FPS游戏中的经典之作，时值今日也有许多许多中国玩家在默默啃着其正版与盗版。如今，优秀的KF2的横空出世不免会为他的前作KF蒙上一层掩盖其光辉历史的毡布。但是它曾经带给玩家们的欢乐与刺激的联机体验是无法被掩盖的。当你会想起以前在KF中默默刷着各个兵种的经验值的日子，也许你会想重新打开这款游戏，重新回到这个曾经厮杀奋战过的“旧地末世”。
supa
То что надо.
good game and funny glitches

To put it simply, Killing Floor is a great game. The idea of the game is similar to Left 4 Dead, but is a totaly different type of co-op survival horror. In Killing Floor, you are able to play with all of your friends. You can join lobbies with upto 16 people. Once you are in game, you have to survive a certain amount of rounds while trying to fight off some of the craziest types of zombies.

I didnt play the game alot, but its nice. I like the idea of not having a crosshair, it makes it more survival horror-ish. The challenge is great, and workshop support is a nice bonus. This game is obviously based on coop, so its better to play with friends. Nice thing is that the game comes with two guest passes, that allow people to access the full game for a limited time. And if they like  it, they may buy it and play with you. The whole atmosphere is really nice and creepy, and it'll suck you in. Try it now while its on sale!!
Sorry Valve but i enjoy this more than L4D one and L4D2 :3
so sick and tired of this game crashing  if its not the killingfloor.ini its the exe... i want my money back   this is a waste

i do recommend this game. however recent issues presented after a year of use... ive looked and found how to get the dwarfs axe. however in the f2p game dwarfs... i come with an issue. i got the achievent needed to get the axe, but when logging into killingfloor after reading some short game issues from an old event not to be seen again. i cant unlock the axe on the moon base even after completing the Not a war hammer in dwarfs of 149760 points to get it. i cant unlock the axe. i am unhappy with the game and i am currently looking into how to get the axe unlocked for other users, and myself. my issues are known by others who share my plight and we are working on finding a server with it on the ground ready to be picked up. to unlock for anyone. if this review is seen i hope some understnading and messages will be sent to me to allow me some relivant knowledge so i may be happy with the game once again.
I guess I'd give this game a thumbs up.

If you like any type of survival first person shooter games, you'll like this one.  It's very simple concept, surviving each wave upgrading for better equipments and leveling each perk to maximize your ability to do more.  Yes, I only got this game for $5.  The new Killing Floor 2 is out, I'll try that out when it becomes $20 or under.

Me esperaba un shooter de zombies muy genérico, de hecho se puede observar a simple vista que bebe mucho de L4D en el diseño de algunos zombies. Pero en su jugabilidad no se parece en nada al juego de Valve y es muy divertido gestionar tu dinero, tus recursos y mejorar con la práctica para acceder a dificultades más difíciles. Incluso si no lo compráis en rebajas cada céntimo habrá valido la pena por las horas que os ofrecerá.
